attributes.action: require the unemployed to report daily for community work in order to receive unemployment benefit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All persons in receipt of unemployment benefit should be required to report & sign-on daily for work in the community.e.g. work to assist the elderly, the disabled, cleaning of parks, rivers & waterways, public areas. Worktime should be calculated based on the benefit received in relation to the minimum wage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
